website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive paddle ball set that comes with three extra balls.
pros: Last for a long time without damage
cons: The quality on the replacement balls is not as high as the original ball in the set

customer_reviews.title: The Replacement Balls
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this despite the other reviews that the replacement balls were not of the same quality as the original. Maybe they corrected that after those previous reviews, because in the set that I purchased the replacement balls are the same and you can begin to play with whatever color you like. Also, the quality of the paddles is great and if you're worried about getting a little splinter from the edges, then sand them or run them along the sand when you're playing on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: all you need
customer_reviews.text: this is the third time I have purchased this Kadima set. Twice I bought it to ise in a gift basket and once we bought it for our own use at the beach. I like that The paddles and balls come in a reusable mesh bag and I can buy replacement balls with the set because I know we will lose some. The paddles are comfortable and durable. A good set at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Beach tennis is always fun!
customer_reviews.text: Nice set and worth the money. It's been a while since I played the game and it was fun getting back to it. 2 things I hope the company can fix: 1) the blue rubber ball that comes can use some more air. 2) the extra balls that came with it are plastic and Franky are for kids 5 years or less and not for adult. Totally unnecessary. They should be rubber balls as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CHEAPLY MADE PADDLES AND BALLS
customer_reviews.text: Those paddles are extremely cheaply made... They are not big enough, and are not hollow as they should be.... Also, the balls are super-cheap and don't make the satisfying sound when I played these game on the beach with the real stuff... So product is going back.....
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: EXTRA BALLS NOT RUBBER
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived today. The additional balls are not as the original - which comes packaged with the paddles and which is a rubber ball. The additional balls are vinyl/plastic which is not what I expected and is NOT ORIGINAL as described.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M

customer_reviews.title: Great Game - Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love playing this on the beach - its an all time classic! This set comes with the paddles and ball plus a set of extra balls. Paddles are well made too and they stand up to wear and tear - sand, water, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Did not expect this
customer_reviews.text: I'm not quite sure what happened but we seemed to have received a used item, repackaged as a new item, in which someone had written all over one of the paddles with a sharpie pen. Not too happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: Can I give 0 stars? The first picture was taken 10 min after opening the Prokadima and the second the third time we played on the beach. This is very poor quality! We ordered this in order to keep it in Florida as we come often for vacation (we are from Canada). We are leaving in two days and I can’t even return it.
customer_reviews.author: Tania T

customer_reviews.title: Paddles float, extra balls have more bounce
customer_reviews.text: Decently made wood paddles which float in water. The extra balls have more bounce (which I prefer) so I would recommend purchasing them. Handle-paddles interface is a bit rough so may cause hot spots with heavy use. Overall a solid product for a low price that lasted a 2 week trip with moderate use, personally prefer plastic paddles but was unable to find them online
customer_reviews.author: Emil Barkovich

customer_reviews.title: Just as I rem we and expected :)
customer_reviews.text: I cannot attest to the ‘durability’ as we have not yet played. However it looks exactly like the set I used to play with 30 years ago and I am sooooo excited to give it a try in our next vaca with my now grown kids! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun fun fun in the sun
customer_reviews.text: I used to play kadima back in high school in south Florida. Seemed everybody did. We bought this set for a trip this summer and it was just as much fun now as then. The paddles seem to be a little lighter weight (quality?) than back then, but did just fine. You don't want them to get super wet, as they're just plywood and will delaminates after a while. For 20 bucks though, the fauna nod exercise can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bemis

customer_reviews.title: Great quality Kadima paddles and rubber balls, exactly what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: I used to play Kadima on the beach as a kid and was looking for the classic set. This set was so perfect, we actually bought a second so that we can play with 4 people. The balls are rubber, not plastic, and have stood up to many hour of play, oceans, pools, and sand. Paddles are durable and thick, exactly like the set we used to have.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: the replacement balls suck just like everyone else has been saying
customer_reviews.text: the replacement balls suck just like everyone else has been saying. Also my set of paddles weren't perfect, one of them had noticeable defects in shaping and the cut of the wood. but nothing that Stopped you from being able to play the game just fine. overall, it was worth the purchase, i just hope i don't lose the one good ball!
customer_reviews.author: Dudley Dobershtook

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: Read the fine print. advertised on amazon's main page as 4 paddles an 2 packs of balls though once you click that link it is actually 2 paddles and 1 pack of ball. if you're used to amazon being reliable until the last 5 years and don't triple check what you're ordering, you'll get burned like I did and have to waste your valuable time returning so you can buy the same thing for $5 less elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan G.

customer_reviews.title: Great orody!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied! Slightly coming apart near the edges but that's what happens when you play in the sand and salt water!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Westphal

customer_reviews.title: Beach Fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for our fancy beach house because that's how we roll
customer_reviews.author: Marc L. Soloff

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good product and 3 extra balls!
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find item in any store in August. So glad I found it online. Love the idea of the extra balls, have chased those thing in the ocean before! Good quality paddles, should last a lot of summers.
customer_reviews.author: le avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Hard game but product was good
customer_reviews.text: Set seemed fine bu to hard of a game for me
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Fun outdoor game!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love playing this simple yard game!! Good quality and no net or set up needed. Small enough to tote along to the park or weekend getaway!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: It's Prime, but took 10 days to receive
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied with the product, but I expected to receive it a week earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Tsugumi

customer_reviews.title: Bit too heavy
customer_reviews.text: Looks are similar to picture, nice item except it is a bit too heavy, like the lighter kinds a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M

customer_reviews.title: It's exactly what it looks like.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what else to say. You get what you see.
customer_reviews.author: Reed

customer_reviews.title: A great set!
customer_reviews.text: This set and net made our old table function like a brand new one! So excited to have a net that really works!!
customer_reviews.author: CCG

customer_reviews.title: Only one that included Replacement Balls
customer_reviews.text: Order arrived on time & in perfect condition. LOVED that it included the replacement balls, which made the value even better than competitors. We had a great time on the beach with them! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Glad2bv

customer_reviews.title: Classic beach game!
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality set. My son wanted it to play at the beach this year, as we had to borrow from friends last year. My son and his cousins (ages 8-24) love it. Tough for little kids. Definitely get the extra balls....
customer_reviews.author: pendron

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for home and the beach. They are nice quality and sturdy! We have so much fun playing!
customer_reviews.author: Le Reve Aesthetics

customer_reviews.title: Paddles lack overall durability
customer_reviews.text: Played with these paddles 2 days. On the second day, the wood on one of the paddles already "peeled". We didn't even play with the paddles in the water. Would have thought the quality of a product that has been around for 40 years would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Rorrer

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping! Love this set. Only downside the replacement balls are not the same as the better original ball.
customer_reviews.author: Beeja75

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the replacement balls are trash, but the original ball is good
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: Our whole family enjoys this paddle set. We primarily use it at the beach. So much fun and great work out!
customer_reviews.author: Juan Munoz

customer_reviews.title: My dad and I love this game
customer_reviews.text: My dad and I love this game! I got him this set for Father's Day and it has been a hit for everyone. The grandkids love to play and the adults do too. Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: readwritelove

customer_reviews.title: Nice Paddle Ball Set for a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Nice paddle ball set for a great price. Comes with extra balls, which is great for ensuring hours of fun, even when you lose a ball in the sand.
customer_reviews.author: South Bay All Day

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Great for the price. We use all the time on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Matkovic

customer_reviews.title: If you get bored just sitting on beach this is great game to ...
customer_reviews.text: Must have for the beach. If you get bored just sitting on beach this is great game to play and have fun. Fun for kids all the way to adults.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small paddles.
customer_reviews.text: The paddles are smaller than your typical beach paddle ball. Maybe similar in size to a ping pong paddle with a longer handle.
customer_reviews.author: Bess

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super fun game at the beach. I suck at it though.
customer_reviews.author: caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality glue wood separation
customer_reviews.text: The paddles did not hold up the wood was separating , ordered a replacement and the quality was just the same and returned both sets
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The paddles are HUGE and the balls don't bounce well at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Talbot

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: We use them at the beach all the time. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Roku

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a wooden racket game to play with my kids during the summer. we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Gizelle Gelinsky

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Only used it twice so far, until now no defects. Also the replacement smash Balls are good.
customer_reviews.author: Maurits

customer_reviews.title: Fun exercise
customer_reviews.text: Gets this sedentary mom moving at the beach or park
customer_reviews.author: Mamarama

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made. We used it outside by our ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. We used it outside by our pool, and within a week one paddle fell apart and the others are cracking. (Made in China)
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete
customer_reviews.text: Only came with 2 spare balls instead of 3. Spare balls were loose and not in package shown in pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun item
customer_reviews.text: Perfect set for the beach and park. Lots of fun and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Julie L

customer_reviews.title: great product, great pice point!
customer_reviews.text: Just what you would expect! A fun game for the beach or any open space. Seller is responsive!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great game.
customer_reviews.text: Built well. I'm sure it will last year's.. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Vee

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Product was just what I wanted and arrived very quickly
customer_reviews.author: Nancy a Farley

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: These are so much fun! My husband, son and I really enjoyed this game. You can hit them really hard and they're easy to return. I like this better than kadima!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Original Game!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect set. My husband grew up playing this game every summer and it was just as he remembered it!
customer_reviews.author: chelseap

customer_reviews.title: Not very good.
customer_reviews.text: Not very good. I think you can find better paddles and balls.
customer_reviews.author: TheOvadia

customer_reviews.title: What u expect
customer_reviews.text: Not as much fun as u expect but they've lasted the whole summer without any damage
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: good quality and spending good time with family and friends
customer_reviews.author: Danilo Mata Corella

customer_reviews.title: they are great quality and easy to carry everywhere
customer_reviews.text: All we were missing for the summer, they are great quality and easy to carry everywhere. Highly recommend them :)
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: Fun stuff
customer_reviews.text: Need tape aroma me the handles but they are priced well
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful game that we've been playing for years (especially fun ...
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful game that we've been playing for years (especially fun to take to the beach). Decided to buy some as gifts for other family members.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I thought I was getting a good price.
customer_reviews.text: I found the same set for half the price in a very expensive beach town, I thought I was getting a good price...
customer_reviews.author: RutyT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good rackets with a solid grip even when wet and sandy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: balls & bikinis
customer_reviews.text: I really just needed the extra balls. but I am happy with my purchase... now the real challenge is finding a partner who is good at this game and looks great in a bikini : )
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice solid water game. Lot's of fun at the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron O

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: liked it, the ball that comes wit the paddle is nicer. but really fun to play
customer_reviews.author: Talita e Ronaldinho

customer_reviews.title: Pro-Kadima
customer_reviews.text: We spend a lot of time at the beach and this paddle set provides fun and entertainment for the whole family. I should've bought 2 so the whole family could play at once.
customer_reviews.author: ddubet

customer_reviews.title: Love the game
customer_reviews.text: Very fun game just wish it was more mainstream. Shipping was good and I would buy more... Just wish had more control over what balls we received
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Dawn Jacob

customer_reviews.title: fun beach game
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to play with the kids, when on the beach and gave this a try. It is quite fun, and they liked it. Both are ages 6&9, and did well. The ball is low resistance, which means it has a low "bounce" factor, and won't go too far when you hit it with the wood paddle. My husband and I had fun playing it, too. It is easy to pack on trips, and a fun new thing to do!
customer_reviews.author: kris

product_meta.title: Pro Kadima Paddle Set Plus Replacement Smash Balls Bundle
product_meta.description: Package Quantity:1The Pro Kadima paddle ball racquet set by sport design needs no net, court or other accessories, making it a great game for the beach, campsite or park. Pro Kadima is a game of coordination and cooperation with 2 specially constructed racquets with ball.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars322 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
